level.text: This Chapter establishes the Public Service Commission’s (“Commission”) regulations governing the disclosure of fuel mix and emissions applicable to an Electricity Supplier as provided in D.C. Official Code §§ 34-1504(c)(2) and 34-1517(b)-(c).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 9737 (September 12, 2008), incorporating by reference the text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 7572 (July 11, 2008).
